pullrequest.title: Disable tests compilation by default in cmake

content.raw: Thanks for the feedback. I've created [a different PR](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2499/disable-tests-compilation-by-default-new/diff) implementing the 'make tests' idea. I think that it is a pretty intrusive change to be included in the gazebo7 series (specially thinking in downstream maintainers) so I targeted it to gazebo8. My personal impression is that would be better to decline this PR so we don't end up with different changes go at the same time to two active branches (generating confusion in gazebo developers) but I can be convinced of merging both if you think otherwise.
